entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Shawinigan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shawinigan 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -11.6°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
